senses.sense_definition: Able to be moved or set in motion.

examples.text: The artist designed the sculpture with <w>motionable</w> parts that spin in the wind.
In the frozen winter landscape, nothing seemed <w>motionable</w> or alive.

senses.sense_definition: Suitable or valid to be proposed as a formal motion in a meeting or legal context.

examples.text: The chairperson ruled that the topic was not <w>motionable</w> under the current agenda.
We need to determine if this amendment is <w>motionable</w> before we proceed to a vote.
